Information We Collect: 
a. Personal Information: We may collect certain personal information that you provide to us voluntarily, such as your name, email address, phone number, delivery address, and payment details when you create an account, place an order, or communicate with us.

b. Usage Information: We automatically collect certain information about how you use the App, including your IP address, device information, browser type, and operating system. This information helps us analyze user behavior, improve the App performance, and enhance your experience.

c. Location Information: With your explicit consent, we may collect your precise location information to facilitate the delivery of your orders or provide location-based services. You can opt out of sharing this information at any time through your device settings.

d. Order History: We collect and store information related to your order history, such as past orders, preferences, and ratings/reviews provided by you or other users.

Use of Information: 
a. Provide and Improve Services: We use the collected information to process your orders, deliver food, and provide customer support. It helps us personalize your experience, recommend restaurants, and improve our services, features, and content.

b. Communication: We may use your contact information to send you transactional messages, updates, promotions, or other relevant information about the App or our services. You can opt out of receiving such communications at any time.

c. Analytics and Aggregated Data: We may use non-personal information and anonymized data for statistical analysis, market research, and improving our services. Aggregated data may be shared with third parties for analytical purposes. 
d. Legal Compliance: We may use or disclose your information if required by law, legal proceedings, or to protect our rights, safety, or the rights and safety of our users or others.

At our delivery app, we believe that good food should be accessible to everyone, regardless of their location or busy schedules. With just a few taps on your smartphone, you can browse through a diverse selection of cuisines and restaurants, all ready to cater to your unique tastes. From hearty burgers to exotic sushi, comforting pizzas to spicy curries, we have a vast range of options to satisfy every craving.
We have partnered with an extensive network of local restaurants and culinary experts who are passionate about delivering high-quality meals to your doorstep. Our team meticulously handpicks each restaurant, ensuring that they maintain exceptional standards in terms of taste, hygiene, and customer service. This means that when you order through our app, you can expect nothing less than the best.
Our user-friendly interface makes it incredibly easy to navigate through the app. You can browse menus, read reviews, and compare prices to make an informed decision. We provide detailed descriptions and mouthwatering food images to help you make the perfect choice. Customizing your order is a breeze, allowing you to add special instructions or dietary preferences with just a few taps.

Q: How does the food delivery app work? \nA: Our food delivery app connects you with local restaurants in your area. Simply download the app, create an account, and enter your location. Browse through the available restaurants, select your desired dishes, customize your order if needed, and proceed to checkout. Once your order is confirmed, our delivery partners will pick up your food and deliver it to your specified location.
